pr_title: GEODE-7864: Prevented non synchronized override of synchronized methods.

timeline.message: GEODE-7864: Prevented non synchronized override of synchronized methods.

timeline.bodyText: We may not need synchronized(this) in this method.
timeline.author: agingade

replies.bodyText: The parents are synchronized and the override is not. This is not considered a good practice. I will look into this a bit more.
replies.author: nabarunnag

timeline.bodyText: We may not need synchronized(this) in this method.
timeline.author: agingade

replies.bodyText: The parents are synchronized and the override is not. This is not considered a good practice. I will look into this a bit more.
